---
name: "Feature: User Roles"
about: "Add support for different user roles (e.g., admin, organizer, member)."
title: "[Feature] User Roles"
labels: [enhancement]
assignees: []
---

**Problem:**
There is no distinction between students and teachers/admins.

**Proposed Solution:**
Implement user roles with different permissions (e.g., only teachers can add/remove participants).

**Benefits:**
- Improved security
- Enables admin-only features

**Additional context:**
See Evolvve-Student-Chapter-App for reference.
